text:
Jason Morgan Ritter (born February 17, 1980) is an American actor. He received an Emmy Award nomination for his role in "Parenthood".
Ritter's mother is Nancy Morgan. His father was John Ritter. Ritter first appeared in the opening credits of his father's show, "Three's Company". He was the little blonde haired boy running up to Joyce DeWitt in the petting zoo scene.
